extendedInfo.description: Total Defense 3D brings a whole new level of action to Android defense games. This state of the art strategy will unleash a cascade of new RTS and RPG features as you drown in the intensive battles across the unknown universe! Combat & conquer planets, raise towers and erase alien monuments, repel enemy legions, advance technologies, mine resources and even destroy enemy passageways â adopt your own strategy!Lead the rebellion! Discover the dangers of faraway galaxies and face the armies of the evil Emperor in more than twenty epic missions, inspired by the gems of the space opera genre!GET READY FOR:â STUNNING 3D â amazing graphics & free camera view as youâve never seen before in defense gamesâ TERRAMORPHING â bomb bridges, destroy monuments, block passages for maximum tactical advantageâ ENGAGING GAMEPLAY â multiple weaponry and technologies to build and upgradeâ ACTION & RTS â intensive battles in three terrains for ultimate TD experienceâ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES appealing to both casual and hardcore gamersâ FUTURISTIC SOUNDTRACK to amplify your sci-fi gaming experienceThe future of the galaxy is in YOUR hands! Get Total Defense 3D & shape the fate of the world NOW!

reviews.title: Fun with a learning curve
reviews.comment: A very advanced game, to me at least, that allows for great growth in skill. A bit tough starting with no instructions, but I learned quick.

reviews.author: Richard Greasley

reviews.title: Gorgeous but VERY Problematic
reviews.comment: This is definitely the most visually pleasing tower defense game I have ever played.  The instructions for early levels are very tutorial-like.  There are three levels of gameplay for each mission.  However, after getting the planet unlock pack, mine are all still locked.  After getting the gate repair pack, I\'m still at zero gate repairs.  The \"press and hold to repair gate\" upgrade doesn\'t work at all.  When I accidentally click on the (now pointless) \"repair gate\" icon, it gives a popup message that cannot be cleared without exiting the level and losing most of my progress.  Nothing in the game indicates :how much: of an increase an upgrade actually gives.  The \"unlock for free\" links do nothing but reload the game.  All in all, Fantastic start to a wonderful game but definitely needs some polish.  Prognosis: positively preeminent but presently unplayable.
reviews.author: mike burns

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: But I\'m surprised NO ONE has made light of the panning when trying to navigate around the map. It is the kost horrendous I have ever seen. It\'s like a juvenile computer mouse that is running out of batteries that you have to swipe 10 times in order to get to the same place you woukd have with one. -2 stars as the struggle lingers within me and I subconciously FIGHT with my Android UI even though it is smooth as butter.
reviews.author: Steven Kunka

reviews.comment: Great game. Hours of fun playing! !
